scripts.build: date +"%T" && echo "Cleaning..." && rm -rf ./js && echo "Compiling..." && tsc && echo "Done!" && date +"%T" && echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
scripts.bundle: npm run build && browserify --node --ignore-missing js/yuki/yukine.js | terser > compiled/yukine.js
scripts.compile: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.clean-test: npm run clear && npm run pre-test && npm run test
scripts.compile-test: npm run build && npm run clean-test
scripts.compile-test-view: npm run compile-test && npm run view-coverage
scripts.win-build: date /t && echo "Cleaning..." && del "./js" /s /q && echo "Compiling..." && tsc && echo "Done!" && date /t && echo "~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~"
scripts.win-bundle: npm run win-build && browserify --node --ignore-missing js/yuki/yukine.js | terser > compiled/yukine.js
scripts.win-compile: npm run win-build && npm run start
